dict.acceptation: 无疑；一定，确实；（回答）当然，好；保管；

sent.orig: For surely your enemies, O LORD, surely your enemies will perish; all evildoers will be scattered.
sent.trans: 耶和华阿，你的仇敌都要灭亡，一切作孽的也要离散。

sent.orig: Surely, surely, we have ransomed one another, with all this woe!
sent.trans: 确确实实，我们已经用这一切悲苦彼此赎救了！

sent.orig: Li Staying at hotels and going about sightseeing would cost a lot, surely.
sent.trans: 住旅馆和到处游览肯定要花不少钱。

sent.orig: Of course, there will surely be setbacks and mistakes in the course of development.
sent.trans: 当然，在发展进程中不会没有曲折，没有缺点。

sent.orig: For me, the former is surely a wise choice.
sent.trans: 对我来说，前者无疑是明智的选择。
